column1: '''''O Hobbit''''' is the official Brazilian edition of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s ''[[The Hobbit]]'', translated to Brazillian Portuguese by Lenita Maria Rimoli Esteves and Almiro Pisetta, with revision by [[Ronald Kyrmse]].<ref>{{HM
